ROOT.ds0: SELECT d1.devicestrid as deviceid,t.deptdesc || ' ' || d1.devicedesc as devicename FROM psgraph_data.tdevice{{3}} d1 LEFT JOIN DBDEVICE d2 ON d1.devicename=d2.fullname left join psgraph_data.tdepartment{{3}} t on d1.ownerdepartidx=departidx WHERE d2.FACTORY_NAME={0} AND d2.DEVMODE_NAME={1} AND d1.devicestrid<>{2} ORDER BY t.deptdesc,d1.devicedesc
ROOT.ds1: --缺陷 SELECT VOLTAGEDESC||DEPTDESC||'.'||D1.DEVICEDESC AS DEV,COUNT(TF_DEFECTRECORD.DEVICESTRID) AS COT, TO_CHAR(RUNDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS RUNDATE FROM PSGRAPH_DATA.TDEVICE_TJ D1 JOIN DEVICEPARAM.DBDEVICE D2 ON D1.DEVICENAME=D2.FULLNAME JOIN PSGRAPH_DATA.TDEPARTMENT_TJ T ON D1.OWNERDEPARTIDX=DEPARTIDX JOIN PSGRAPH_DATA.TVOLTAGE_TJ V ON T.VOLTAGEIDX=V.VOLTAGEIDX LEFT JOIN DEVICEPARAM.TF_DEFECTRECORD ON D1.DEVICESTRID=TF_DEFECTRECORD.DEVICESTRID WHERE D2.FACTORY_NAME={0} AND D2.DEVMODE_NAME={1} AND D1.DEVICESTRID<>{2} GROUP BY VOLTAGEDESC||DEPTDESC||'.'||D1.DEVICEDESC,RUNDATE,t.deptdesc,d1.devicedesc ORDER BY t.deptdesc,d1.devicedesc
ROOT.ds2: --检修 SELECT V.VOLTAGEDESC||DEPTDESC||'.'||D1.DEVICEDESC AS DEV,COUNT(R.DEVICENAME) AS COT, TO_CHAR(RUNDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS RUNDATE FROM PSGRAPH_DATA.TDEVICE_TJ D1 JOIN DEVICEPARAM.DBDEVICE D2 ON D1.DEVICENAME=D2.FULLNAME JOIN PSGRAPH_DATA.TDEPARTMENT_TJ T ON D1.OWNERDEPARTIDX=DEPARTIDX AND ISOWNSDJK=1 JOIN PSGRAPH_DATA.TVOLTAGE_TJ V ON T.VOLTAGEIDX=V.VOLTAGEIDX LEFT JOIN DEVICEPARAM.TF_MAINTENANCEPLAN R ON R.DEVICENAME LIKE '%%' || D1.DEVICENAME ||'%%' WHERE D2.FACTORY_NAME={0} AND D2.DEVMODE_NAME={1} AND D1.DEVICESTRID<>{2} GROUP BY V.VOLTAGEDESC||DEPTDESC||'.'||D1.DEVICEDESC,RUNDATE,DEPTDESC,d1.devicedesc ORDER BY DEPTDESC,d1.devicedesc
